entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.8°C

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28 except minus 24 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28 except minus 24 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
